title: Software Engineer III, Embedded Systems, Geo Hardware
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Write and review product/system development code.
- Triage and resolve product/system issues.
- Own software life cycle for sensor systems.
- Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams.
- Develop high-performance software for advanced sensor systems.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
- 2 years of C++ software development experience.
- 2 years working with embedded operating systems.
- Experience in a Linux environment.
- Familiarity with GNSS and sensor integration.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- C++ programming language.
- Embedded operating systems.
- Linux environment.
- GNSS technologies (e.g., GPS).
- Serial protocols (e.g., SPI, I2C).

criteria.name: Industries
criteria.value: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet

title: Software Engineer, ML Infrastructure, Chrome
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Build and maintain scalable ML infrastructure for Chrome.
- Develop systems for model management and execution.
- Collaborate with feature teams to integrate ML solutions.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
- 2 years of software development experience.
- Experience with software development life-cycle and codebases.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Programming languages: C++, Java, Python, Go.
- Machine learning tools: TensorFlow, TFLite.
- ML infrastructure: model serving platforms, data pipelines.

criteria.value: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet

title: Software Engineer III, Infrastructure, Google Cloud Platforms
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Write product or system development code.
- Participate in design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
- Review and provide feedback on code developed by others.
- Triage and debug product or system issues.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
- 2 years of experience in C++ software development.
- 2 years of experience with large-scale infrastructure or distributed systems.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- C++ programming language.
- Cloud networking and cloud infrastructure.
- Performance analysis and visualization tools.

title: Optics and Display Test Engineer, Consumer Hardware
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Design and develop factory test stations for optics/display/camera calibration.  
- Collaborate with manufacturers to integrate hardware and software for production lines.  
- Analyze build data to improve accuracy and stabilize hardware setups.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.  
- 3 years of experience in testing consumer electronic products.  
- Experience in optics, display, or camera testing.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Hardware/software debug and failure analysis.  
- Mechanical and software test station development.  
- Calibration of cameras, colorimeters, and optical instruments.

title: Software Engineer, Embedded Systems, Firmware, Ambient Platform
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Write product or system development code.  
• Participate in design reviews with peers and stakeholders.  
• Debug and resolve product or system issues.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.  
• 2 years of C/C++ software development experience.  
• 2 years working with embedded operating systems.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Embedded operating systems.  
• C/C++ programming languages.  
• Low-level hardware interaction.
